Inferring ecological interactions

Aims

To compare methods for inferring species interactions

Where

Sherbrooke, Quebec

When

Nov 30th - Dec 2nd, 2016

Who

Dominique Grazel, Tim Poisot, Kevin Cazelles, Ben Weinstein, Ignacio Bartomeus
